ai-pp1.6:2.1_0: This person isn’t able to realize all things that entail past, and present in regard to all things that play a person, I am capable of realizing anything that can be realized.
ai-pp1.6:2.2_0: This person isn’t able to realize all things that entail past, and she does not perceive them as such.
ai-pp1.6:2.3_0: Take a person who doesn’t understand before things that entail suffering in the present life. They confus and experience the complete ending of suffering.
ai-pp1.6:2.4_0: There’s a person who doesn’t completely understand regarding things that entail suffering in the present life. They don’t take pleasure in the present life. They don’t realize the teaching of the noble ones, and don’t reach the complete ending of suffering.
ai-pp1.6:2.5_0: There’s no person who, beforening them, you don’t realize the undefiled freedom of heart and freedom by wisdom in this very life. And they don’t become a non-returner.
ai-pp1.6:2.6_0: There’s no person who, beforening them, you don’t realize the undefiled freedom of heart and freedom by wisdom in this very life. They live having realized it with their own insight due to the ending of suffering in this very life.
ai-pp1.6:3.1_0: The group of six is finished.
